og.description: As you prepare your 2014 taxes, you may notice that the 2014 personal exemptions and standard deductions are higher than for 2013 filings. So are the dollar amounts that separate each tax rate bracket from the next highest. These amounts are adjusted upward each year for inflation, in a procedure [...]
